scripts.build: pnpm --filter @pp-clca-pcm/domain build && pnpm --filter @pp-clca-pcm/application build && pnpm --filter @pp-clca-pcm/adapters build
scripts.build:all: pnpm build && pnpm --filter @pp-clca-pcm/api-nestjs build && pnpm --filter @pp-clca-pcm/front-nextjs build
scripts.clean: pnpm --filter @pp-clca-pcm/domain clean && pnpm --filter @pp-clca-pcm/application clean && pnpm --filter @pp-clca-pcm/adapters clean
